message: The 16 mobile theses ... do you agree ?
story: Mohammed Hussien shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: 16 mobile theses
caption: ben-evans.com
description: We’re now coming up to 9 years since the launch of the iPhone kicked off the smartphone revolution, and some of the first phases are over - Apple and Google both won the platform war, mostly, Facebook made the transition, mostly, and it’s now perfectly clear that mobile is the future of technology a…
